title: Google Adsする
body:
In normal SSR, it is possible to distribute and monetize advertisements by simply setting the auto ad script for Google Adsスクリプト in `<head></head>`.

In the case of SPA, the number of advertisements displayed is often decreased, such as using auto- advertising only, because there is no reload due to page transition.

Therefore, you can set the ad frame manually by using [ng2- ads ] (https://www.npmjs.com/package/ng2- ads ).

## ng2- ads 

Environment::ular v13

ng2- ads 

2. Set to `app.module.ts` (module linked to the component you want to display advertising, or module created for common use. )

```ts
@NgModule({
  declarations: [AppComponent],
  imports: [
    BrowserModule,
    AppRoutingModule,
    AdsenseModule.forRoot({ adClient: 'ca-pub-**************' }),
  ],
  providers: [],
  bootstrap: [AppComponent],
})
export class AppModule {}
```

4. Add layout components that you want to display

```html
<ng2-adsense
  style="display: block"
  adFormat="fluid"
  slot="*******"
  layoutKey="********"
></ng2-adsense>
```

Please use Google AdS。 for slot and layoutKey settings.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29157528/158059598-f309054a-618f-46aa-aa80-b013a392894b.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29157528/158059662-bfd1a4d8-778c-4e6c-8b63-83db0e7c8402.png)

slot etc. displayed in ^ are supported.

You can display。 by setting above.

I want to be able to use automatic advertising in SPA, but I think that it seems to be a little strict if I think about the type of advertisement that is sandwiched with the page transition.
